title: Mathematics Learning Achievement Improvement Strategies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning operation combining asynchronous LMS with weekly face-to-face sessions in a digital device-provided environment. Learners consist of general citizens with advanced-level mathematical expertise.

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to create self-directed learning plans in blended learning environments by over 80%
Learners enhance their mathematical problem-solving competencies by over 75% using LMS (Learning Management System) tools and resources
Learners achieve a learning satisfaction index of 4.0+ (on a 5-point scale) based on online-face-to-face interaction experiences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
